title: Descriptions: Color / Clothing (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Color / Clothing subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Those yellow-green shoes are cute, aren't they.
cards.romaji: Sono kimidori no kutsu, kawaii desu ne.
cards.japanese: その黄緑の靴、かわいいですね。
